NAME: Shubham Shukla
ABOUT: I am in the final year of Integrated Post Graduation at IIITM-Gwalior.  I believe in working hard and patiently contributing to ideas until they turn exciting.

EDUCATION.Institute Name: ABV-Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management

EXPERIENCE.Company Name: ABV-Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Autonomous Traffic Management System using Reinforcement Learning
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
BTech Thesis 
• Implemented a vehicle counting(OpenCV) and classification module(Mobilenet)
on a raspberry pi to be mounted on proposed smart traffic lights along with a camera.
• Trained a deep reinforcement learning(Duelling DQN) agent to control the
traffic lights which can obtain the state observed by them and decide a suitable
signal sequence.
• Benchmark the effectiveness of the proposed system by simulation using
SUMO library.

Stanford ML Group Competition
• MURA is a large dataset of X-ray studies of patients of the upper body parts.
• Automatized the abnormality detection in x-rays using robust deep learning
and relevant image enhancements

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Cartbuddy - A grocery cart companion at a shopping mall
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Submitted to HackerEarth Deep Learning Challenge I with Global Rank 77

• Determined the type of product (among 25 classes) based on the product
images clicked in a grocery store.
• Processed and augmented the image to highlight text on the product as a
stroke on which our deep learning network was trained.
• Used Transfer Learning by training an Inception-resnet v3 model pretrained on
’ImageNet’ to make a prediction.

• Preprocessing of audio data and then classification into 10 classes.
• Sampling and smoothing of audio files using librosa.
